title: Lag if me and my brother play lol on same wifi
body: this just happened after this 4 patches I think this never used to happen but since this 4 patches. My game would be having lag spikes and my brother don't. But if I play on my bro's pc closer to the wifi It's not laggy and if  my brother play on my pc it's lagging. But this happened since the last 4 patches arrived this never happened when the last 4 patches arrived. And when my brother is not playing lol it's not laggy riot help pls.

replies.body: Given that your brother is closer to the modem is it at all possible to use ethernet on his PC? If it's a matter of wifi bandwidth then plugging into ethernet will stop his pc clogging up the wifi, if it's just a matter of range you'll have to get a wifi booster/extender to extend the range to your pc properly.
